OrgName.entry: ANGRAM BANK TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Works for the benefit of everyone on Angram Bank. Organises many activities including an annual gala, a carol service, Christian Fellowship, Christian fellowship children's hour, mother and toddler group, summer football training scheme and day trips.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Mon in the month at 3pm (committee meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 35
